reviews.review_msg: Super confusing,  ask a question and she answers with completely unrelated information, then asks "does that make sense?" UM, NO.  Way too many assignments,  and the online class  seems like a very poor adaptation of an in class course. Missing information, terrible lecture slides, etc. WOULD NOT TAKE and I love online classes... pretty easy though

She is pretty harsh on her grading but she wants her students to take her feedback and improve. She is really helpful as long as you go to her office hours. She has given extensions on many papers, including my own... if youre having a hard time with the deadline i suggest talking to her.
